title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.15 - Amateur jockey to be licensed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4002.15 - Amateur jockey to be licensed

State Regulations

An amateur wishing to ride in races on even terms with
jockeys must obtain a jockey license from the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4002.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
